properties.media:imagetext:
WINE LIST
CHAMPAGNE
RED WINES
Champarne
DEUTZ
BRUIN CLASSIC
Champagne Deutz, Brut Classic
This award winning champagne features
lovely aromas and flavours of pear and citrus
fruit. Layered with toasted hazelnut, honey
and sweet vanilla notes, the wine is
balanced by refreshing acidity with a long,
lingering finish. It is a perfect aperitif and
goes well with delicate dishes.
WHITE WINES
SEBASTIANI
SONOMA COUN
Sebastiani Sonoma County Zinfandel 2001
The Zinfandel grape is grown chiefly in
California and is considered as America's red
grape. The 2001 Sebastiani Sonoma County
Zinfandel 2001 is a dark garnet colour, with
the unique character of spiciness. It is well
structured with lush raspberry fruit flavours and
a touch of vanilla. It is a very good complement
to grilled or roasted meat dishes
CAINT VERAN
MERCURE
Arthur Barolet & Fils Saint Véran 2004
The Saint Véran appellation area is located
at the very south of Burgundy in the
Mâconnais region of France. This wine has a
very fresh bouquet of peach, pear and white
flowers. It is fruity. with a hint of mineral
character and a good balance. Enjoy this
wine with grilled chicken, fish and shellfish.
Mercurey Domaine Louis Max 2001
Mercurey Domaine Louis Max 2001 was
produced in the Burgundy - Côte
Chalonnaise area using 100% Pinot Noir
grapes. It is deep and intense cherry red in
colour. Its bouquet is powerful, with
concentrated aromas of raspberry.
blackberry, liquorice and vanilla. This wine
offers a pleasant taste of wood and a good
balance between fine tannins and fruit.
Enjoy this wine with red meat, game or ripe
cheeses.
BLACKSTONE
Blackstone Monterey County Chardonnay
The 2003 Blackstone Monterey County
Chardonnay shows complex flavours of
tronical and citrus fruits with a hint of
mineral notes and a well-integrated toasty
sal character This is a tantastie tood wine
that goes perfectly with roast chicken, pork
and also hearty cream soups.
CX SIGNATURE DRINKS
PORT
CATHAY DELIGHT
A kiwifruit based non-alcoholic
drink with coconut juice and a
touch of fresh mint.
PACIFIC SUNRISE
A refreshing combination of
champagne and Drambuie with
the zest of orange and lemon.
2000
Dow's Late Bottled Vintage Port 2000
This wine is sourced from the same vineyards
that in exceptional years produce Dow's
renowned Vintage Ports. It is aged solely in oak
casks and bottled 5 to 6 vears after the harvest
It is a full rich Port with spicy fruit flavours and
an elegant aromatic nose, well rounded on the
palate and has the traditional Dow's drier
finish. This makes it one of the finest late
Bottled Vintage Ports available.
APERITIFS AND COCKTAILS
Gin • Rum • Vodka • Martini Rosso • Martini
Extra Dry • Campari • Sweet and Dry Sherry •
Bloody Mary • Screwdriver
WHISKIES
Chivas Regal 12 Years Old
Johnnie Walker Gold Label
lack Daniel's Bourhon
Canadian Club
COGNAC
Hine 'Rare and Delicate' Fine Champagne
LIQUEURS
Drambuie • Cointreau • Bailey's Irish Cream
BEER
International Selection
Cathay Pacific aims to offer a diverse selection of wines on
board. but analogies if on some fliahts a certain wine is
not available. Our crew will always be happy to
rocammand an alternativel
CX830, 831, 872, 873, 880, 881, 882, 883, 884, 885 1-3-2006
